## Checklist

### For All Changes

- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](../CONTRIBUTING.md) guide
- [ ] My changes follow the repository's code style
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally

### For New Skills

- [ ] Created `SKILL.md` with proper YAML frontmatter
- [ ] Created `README.md` with installation instructions
- [ ] Created `install.sh` for one-liner installation
- [ ] No hardcoded paths (verified portability)
- [ ] Code examples are runnable
- [ ] Tested installation on my machine

### For Skill Updates

- [ ] Existing functionality is not broken
- [ ] Updated documentation if needed
